Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Limits the amount of addiction and substance abuse facilities in the city of New York
Summary: Limits the amount of addiction and substance abuse facilities to five within the jurisdiction of each community board in the city of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง19.17, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to limiting the amount of addiction and substance abuse facilities in the city of New York
